sentences.en: A drip of water fell from the tap.
sentences.cn: 从龙头滴下一滴水.

sentences.en: All night we heard the drip drip drip of the rain.
sentences.cn: 我们一整夜都听到雨水的滴滴答答声.

sentences.en: Drip or ooze systems are common for pot watering.
sentences.cn: 滴灌和渗灌系统一般也用于盆栽灌水.

sentences.en: Everything he said drip ped acid.
sentences.cn: 他的话里字字句句都带着刺.

sentences.en: He is drip ping sweat.
sentences.cn: 他大汗淋漓。

sentences.en: He is on a saline drip.
sentences.cn: 他正在输盐水.

sentences.en: Her boots were muddy and her hair was dripping .
sentences.cn: 她的靴子沾满了泥，头发在滴水。

sentences.en: Her boots were muddy and her hair was dripping.
sentences.cn: 她的靴子沾满了泥，头发在滴水。

sentences.en: I had a bad attack of pneumonia and spent two days in hospital on a drip.
sentences.cn: 我得了严重的肺炎，在医院输了两天液。

sentences.en: I hate this sort of drip.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌这种无聊的闲话.

sentences.en: I put some plastic buckets on the floor to catch the drips.
sentences.cn: 我把几个塑料桶放在地板上接滴下来的水。

sentences.en: Sit your child forward and let the blood drip into a tissue or on to the floor.
sentences.cn: 让你的孩子前倾坐着，让血滴在纸巾上或地板上。

sentences.en: The faucet has developed a drip.
sentences.cn: 那个水龙头已经开始滴水了.

sentences.en: The patient was put on a drip after her operation.
sentences.cn: 那个病人动过手术后就输液.

sentences.en: The sun was fierce, the land seemed to glisten and drip with steam.
sentences.cn: 天上烈日炎炎, 大地被蒸晒得闪闪发光,热露淋淋.

sentences.en: The tap’s dripping .
sentences.cn: 水龙头在滴水。

sentences.en: There is increasing switch to drip irrigation in all areas.
sentences.cn: 所有地区转换成滴灌的趋势正在增加.

sentences.en: They allowed water to drip down a sloping , red - hot, iron gun - barrel.
sentences.cn: 他们让水滴进倾斜的烧红的铁砧筒里.

sentences.en: Water was dripping through the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 水正透过天花板滴下来。

sentences.en: We heard the drip of a leaky faucet.
sentences.cn: 我听到了漏龙头的滴水声.

words.tran_cn: 水滴，[建]滴水声；静脉滴注；使人厌烦的人

phrases.tran_cn: 滴流咖啡（使沸水慢慢渗过咖啡粉末所泡成的咖啡，等于drip grind）

trans.tran_cn: 水滴，滴液，（医用）滴注器，平庸乏味者
trans.tran_en: one of the drops of liquid that fall from something
to let liquid fall in drops
to let liquid fall in drops
